Articles.Content:
So, I have fuel tanks, docking ports and adapters - all crossfeed-capable parts - but an engine below them is not getting any fuel. I can't figure this out... help??

Edited November 1, 2013 by kurja
the problem appears to be somehow caused by that bicoupler
The bicoupler only allows fuel flow one way - from the single node to the twin nodes. Just place a fuel line from the fuel tanks above to the bicoupler and it should work fine.
Try removing the docking ports to check if fuel will flow that way.
Docking ports don't block fuel flow. The bicoupler does. If you remove them the thing will not be even connected.
Yes, turns out the bicoupler is a fuel diode. Thanks.
